attributes.action: Stop toadying up to George Bush at every possible opportunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair does exactly what George Bush tells him to on all key international affairs and won't ever criticise Bush other than in the most pussy-footing of terms even when everyone else believes Bush to be wrong. Even Harold Wilson managed to keep the UK out of Vietnam - I bet Blair wouldn't have!!
